item.title: First GitHub Pages Post!
item.description: New Home Hi there - how do you like the new digs? After a brief hiatus during grad school application season, I found myself ready to dive back into data, but extremely frustrated with GitHub documents as a medium to share my work. Enter blogdown and GitHub Pages! The blogdown R package makes it easy to create a website using nothing but R Markdown, and then host it on your free personal GitHub URL.
